verses.text: \w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w same|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \f + \fr 19:1 \ft Hebrew In the third month, on the same day; that is, two months after leaving Egypt; see Numbers 33:3.\f* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

After \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Rephidim|strong="H7508"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* entered \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w front|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, “\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w explain|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

‘\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w how|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w eagles|strong="H5404"\w*’ \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Myself.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w treasured|strong="H5459"\w* \w possession|strong="H5459"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*—\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w Mine|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Me|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*.’ \w These|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H4872"\w* back \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H7121"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, “\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dense \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w so|strong="H1571"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w always|strong="H5769"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w relayed|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H6942"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* must \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w set|strong="H1379"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* boundary \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5439"\w*, ‘\w Be|strong="H4191"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* base. \w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w touches|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w shot|strong="H3384"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* arrows—whether man \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w beast|strong="H2421"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.’\f + \fr 19:13 \ft Cited in Hebrews 12:20\f* \w Only|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H3104"\w* \w sounds|strong="H4900"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H4900"\w* \w blast|strong="H4900"\w* \w may|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w approach|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.\f + \fr 19:13 \ft Or may they go up on the mountain\f*”

\w When|strong="H4480"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w washed|strong="H3526"\w* \w their|strong="H3526"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*.

“\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3117"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. “Do \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w draw|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman.” The LORD Visits Sinai

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w*, \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w thick|strong="H3515"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w loud|strong="H2389"\w* blast \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w went|strong="H5971"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* God, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w at|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w foot|strong="H8482"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* enveloped \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* fire. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* \w rose|strong="H5927"\w* \w like|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w furnace|strong="H3536"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w quaked|strong="H2729"\w* \w violently|strong="H3966"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* ram’s \w horn|strong="H7782"\w* \w grew|strong="H1980"\w* \w louder|strong="H3966"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w louder|strong="H3966"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* God \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w summit|strong="H7218"\w*. \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*,

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* said \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w solemnly|strong="H5749"\w* \w warned|strong="H5749"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, ‘\w Put|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* boundary \w around|strong="H5749"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w set|strong="H6942"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w apart|strong="H6942"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.’”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* Aaron \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*. \w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* must \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w break|strong="H2040"\w* \w through|strong="H6555"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H2040"\w* \w out|strong="H6555"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3381"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w*.
